original_text: All these had married foreign women, and some of the women had even borne children.
korean_text: 이상은 모두 이방 여인을 아내로 맞이한 자라 그 중에는 자녀를 낳은 여인도 있었더라

sentences.original_text: All these had married foreign women
and some of the women had even borne children.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자들 중 일부는 심지어 자녀를 낳았습니다.
